original_text: And the Lord said to him, “Go down, and come up bringing Aaron with you. But do not let the priests and the people break through to come up to the Lord, lest he break out against them.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 그에게 이르시되 가라 너는 내려가서 아론과 함께 올라오고 제사장들과 백성에게는 경계를 넘어 나 여호와에게로 올라오지 못하게 하라 내가 그들을 칠까 하노라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said to him,
and come up bringing Aaron with you.
But do not let the priests and the people break through
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 제사장들과 백성이 나아오는 것을 허락하지 말라

sentences.original_text: to come up to the Lord,
lest he break out against them.”
